6.verification_summary: The claim asserts the system was designed with high scalability to support adding and integrating more functions and devices; without additional data, evaluation remains speculative but plausible given standard scalable architectures.

12.verification_summary: The claim lists typical components for an Arduino based IoT setup including Arduino UNO R3, HC 05, relay, PCB, wires, power, WiFi, Arduino IDE and a server; without further context its accuracy cannot be verified.
